dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the land of Eridoria was on the brink of war.

dialogues.speaker: King Arin
dialogues.text: We must defend our kingdom against the dark sorcerer, Xaren. He seeks to conquer and destroy all that is good in this world.

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: I will not let that happen, your majesty. I have been training for this moment my entire life. Let me lead the army against Xaren's forces.
